div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1394 Küchük Köhne, c. 35 km. E of Yoz- (581) gat, Galatian-Cappadocian border, 1930 Burial: c. 325-320 B.C. (Newell) Contents: 28 AR. Pot hoard Amisus: 4 sigloi Sinope: 14 dr. Tarsus: 10 double-sigloi (Mazaeus 6, time of Alexander 4) Disposition: Ankara ? Newell, NNM 46 (1931), pp. 1-33, illus. Schlumberger, L'argent grec, p. 8, no. 6
